name: Layerzero Bridged swBTC (Swellchain)
description: swBTC is a yield bearing ERC-20 Liquid Restaking Token that offers liquidity for users who want to stake their WBTC in protocols like Symbiotic, EigenLayer, or Karak without locking up their WBTC. swBTC allows holders to earn native yield from restaking platforms while simultaneously leveraging swBTC across the DeFi ecosystem. It can be used as collateral in lending and borrowing protocols, DEXs, options platforms, and more.
